channels.description: The Hufflepuff Common Room is located in the basement, near the castle's kitchens.

channels.name: hospital-wing

channels.name: prefects-bathroom

channels.name: transfiguration-classroom

channels.name: charms-classroom

channels.name: herbology-greenhouses
channels.description: The Herbology Greenhouses are located on the grounds of Hogwarts Castle.

channels.description: Chat to Hagrid in his hut outside the Forbidden Forest.

channels.name: pumpkin-patch
channels.description: The Pumpkin Patch is just outside Hagrid's Hut and has lots of pumpkins.

channels.description: The Whomping Willow is a very violent tree that stands on the grounds of Hogwarts Castle with a hidden tunnel beneath its roots :eyes:

channels.name: forbidden-forest
channels.description: The Forbidden Forest is a large, dark forest on the grounds of Hogwarts Castle.

channels.name: chamber-of-secrets

channels.name: quidditch-pitch
channels.description: The Quidditch Pitch is where the Hogwarts Quidditch matches are held.

channels.name: regulation-and-control-of-magical-creatures

channels.name: magical-law-enforcement

channels.name: regulation-and-control-of-magical-transporation
channels.description: The Department of Magical Transportation is responsible for the regulation of all magical travel.

channels.name: magical-accidents-and-catastrophes
channels.description: The Department of Magical Accidents and Catastrophes is responsible for repairing damage caused by magical accidents.

channels.name: international-magical-cooperation
channels.description: The Department of International Magical Cooperation is responsible for maintaining wizarding relations with foreign governments.

channels.name: magical-games-and-sports
channels.description: The Department of Magical Games and Sports is responsible for the regulation of all magical games and sports.

channels.name: mysteries
channels.description: The Department of Mysteries is a section of the Ministry of Magic that carries out confidential research.

channels.name: magical-maintenance
channels.description: The Department of Magical Maintenance is responsible for the maintenance of the Ministry of Magic.
